Reviews.Title: Poor Cusomer Service
Reviews.Author: J. Justesen "Maw"
Reviews.Content: The product worked but not as well as it was advertised. The reception was poor and the face of the door bell was scratched. When I contacted the merchant to send it back  I was told that I would not get a full refund because they had provided the item that I had purchased and it wasn't their fault that I wasn't happy with how it worked. I will never purchase anything from them again!

Reviews.Title: Very bad product!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Marsh
Reviews.Content: This the same brand and product that VIVIMALL is selling here in AMAZON. The one I buyed, DOES NOT WORK properly and the seller is located in China!!! And you won't see your money back...And it looks EXACTLY like this product.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo
Reviews.Content: takes picture of the persons who use it, very easy to use and install .it is a good product I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Jim Clute
Reviews.Content: Good product and suits our needs perfectly. Easy installation and video quality good. Also has decent range via wireless. Follow instructions concerning keeping batteries charged.
